reference_summary:
Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} This does exactly what it's supposed to do! Easy to use, my feet are super soft afterwards. Charges quickly. Great choice! Works Wonderfully! Easydew 2-Step Face Contour Sheet Mask - Tightening & Anti-Aging & Hydrating Korean Face Mask with DW-EGF, Hyaluronic Acid for Anti-Winkle, Reducing Fine Line & Producing Collagen (Qty 5) EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 6.38 x 0.63 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EETS1003', 'Manufacturer': 'CleveAid'} I am obsessed with face masks! These arrived quickly and were well packaged. They have no scent, which is a good thing. Each mask has 2 steps... 1st step is four contour pads for under eye and frown lines and 2nd step is a full sheet mask. It feels amazing on my face! It doesn't shift around at all. I leave it on for 30 minutes and then apply my nighttime moisturizer.

Relaxing to wear
My skin really felt more firm after I used it
Closed my pores

Overall, I really liked this mask. I have tried probably 100 different face masks in my life and this is definitely in my TOP 5. STOP and BUY THIS! GO! Leuxe Facial Cleansing Brush, IPX6 Waterproof Rotating Face Brush for Deep Cleansing, 3 Modes and Smart Timer leuxe {'Brand': 'leuxe', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Pores,Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Operation Mode': 'Automatic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4 x 2.7 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '631517347748', 'Manufacturer': 'leuxe'} When I first began using this I definitely broke out a little more on my chin. I feel like it's because it really got deep down into my pores and brought all the breakouts to the surface. I was able to heal them at once and now my skin has maintained a clear appearance! So get past the beginning phase and you're good to go! I can see and feel the difference. Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz Dr. Denese {'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Dr. Denese', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.57 x 3.15 x 3.07 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '800166A', 'UPC': '811684022284', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'} I wanted to use this for a while before I wrote a review and I absolutely love this stuff! It goes on easily and absorbs well. I feel like my skin looks smoother. I defintely recommend it! LOVE LOVE LOVE! Bioken] Cera Silkway Salon Quality Hair Serum - Enriched Premium Argan Oil (1.7 fl oz) Bioken {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Argan Oil', 'Liquid Volume': '1.7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Bioken', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.81 x 1.77 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '856312005529'} You know when you get your hair done and you leave the salon with your hair smelling amazing the rest of the day...that's what this serum is like! It smells so good. I use it when my hair is wet or when I am just refreshing it mid day. Love it! SMELLS AMAZING! Karuna Oh, Glow On Face Mask Sheet, Skincare and Beauty Facial Masks with Moisturizing and Collagen Promotion Properties for Healthy Glow, Contain Green Tea, Vitamin C and Pineapple (3 Sheets) Karuna {'Brand': 'Karuna', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrate Skin,Hydrate', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 4.88 x 0.87 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MSF1004 - CA', 'UPC': '857950007166'} I don't normally like to use sheet masks, but I really like these. My face felt so soft and moisturized adter using them. I would buy these again I liked them so much. Love these sheet masks Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz Kneipp {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} I love this stuff! It smells really refreshing. I'm into essential oils and it smells just like that...strong but invigorating. It comes out just like shaving cream foam. Scent lasts after you leave the bath/shower. 10/10 recommend Smells SO good! Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz Zeitun {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'} This scrub is fantastic! Love the way it makes my skin feel after using it. Definitely recommend! Love!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user remains dedicated to effective personal care products, increasingly focusing on skin health and incorporating unique bath items into their regimen. Their recent purchase reinforces their positive experience, contributing to their journey towards overall well-being.

- **Product Type Preference:** In addition to their interest in hair care oils and serums, they are actively exploring body care products, with a particular enthusiasm for those that enhance the bathing experience, such as exfoliating scrubs. This highlights a sustained interest in multifunctional products that promote skin vitality.

- **Functionality Focus:** The user prioritizes products that provide visible results for skin texture improvement, hydration, and pleasurable sensory experiences. They particularly appreciate items that offer delightful fragrances and invigorating sensations, underscoring their penchant for indulgent self-care.

- **Convenience & Efficiency:** They continue to favor products that simplify self-care routines, seeking ease of application and seamless integration into daily rituals while delivering effective results without extensive effort.

- **Positive Experience:** The user consistently reports satisfaction with product performance, noting improvements in skin smoothness and overall feel post-use. Their latest acquisition aligns with this trend, enhancing their self-care experience.

- **Aesthetic Appeal:** They have a strong appreciation for visually appealing and innovative personal care products across all categories, particularly those featuring modern design and pleasing scents.

The updated profile reflects an ongoing exploration of effective, stylish, and sensory-oriented personal care solutions, further solidifying their holistic self-care approach.
